mapper.insert: insert into POINT_EXPIRED (EXPIRED_NUM, MEMBERIDX, ORDER_CODE, USEDAMOUNT, USEDDATE, POINT_SAVE_NUM) VALUES (SEQ_POINT_EXPIRED.nextval, #{memberIdx}, #{orderCode}, #{usedAmount}, sysdate, #{pointSaveNum})
mapper.update: update POINT_SAVE set BALANCE = BALANCE - #{usedAmount} where point_save_num = #{pointSaveNum} and MEMBERIDX = #{memberIdx} and enable = 0
mapper.select: SELECT GREATEST(NVL(SUM(BALANCE), 0), 0) FROM POINT_SAVE WHERE MEMBERIDX = #{memberIdx} AND enable = 0
select SAVEAMOUNT as saveAmount, SAVEDATE as saveDate, EXPIREDATE as expireDate, REASON from POINT_SAVE where MEMBERIDX = #{memberIdx}
SELECT point_save_num FROM point_save WHERE memberIdx = #{memberIdx} AND balance > 0 AND enable = 0 ORDER BY saveDate FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: insert into POINT_SAVE(POINT_SAVE_NUM, MEMBERIDX, SAVEAMOUNT, SAVEDATE, EXPIREDATE, REASON, ENABLE, BALANCE) values (SEQ_POINT_SAVE.nextval, #{memberIdx}, #{saveAmount}, sysdate, sysdate + 30, #{reason}, #{enable}, #{balance} )
